page.title: 02Faldingworth Church
page.content: {Faldingworth Church}had been without a vicar for three years.The Parishioners organised services them selves.On the 3rd of September 1985 Rev Victor Erwin was inducted at {Faldingworth Church}by the Bishop of Grimsby. When they have services Mr.Blaikie or Paul Waite usually play the organ.The Church has services once a week.The Church has a choir, uestry the vicar's uestry and a tower uestry. The Church was rebuilt in 1892 by C. Hodgson Fowler except for the base of the tower which is probably 13th. century. The tall spire with its gold coloured weathercock is a good landmark. The East Window was installed in 1893 by Earnest Richard Charles Cust The Church has half an acrea of grass and Mr. Waite cuts it.
